name: We need to talk - LD47
description:
“We need to talk” is a short narrative-driven game, a mixture of dialogue and card games.

At any stage of the dialogue you can use a card to open new speech options. The game was inspired by dialogues in “Disco Elysium” and “Fallout New Vegas”. It has a branching dialogue tree and 3 endings. The only way to win the game is to be honest with yourself.

The game was created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 47 Compo by Stanislav Demchenko.

I used some preexisting code written by myself for dialogues. Other than that everything was created from scratch.

Tools used:

Unity3D

Houdini (Modeling)

Adobe Photoshop (UI)

Cubase (Music)

Adobe Audition (Sound design)

DSP Motion (Sound generation)

Mixamo (Rigging and animation)
